description: Lists the Device Defender audits that have been performed during a given time period. Requires permission to access the ListAuditTasks action.

parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time period. Audit information is retained for a limited time (90 days). Requesting a start time prior to what is retained results in an 'InvalidRequestException'.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: The end of the time period.

nested_items.name: tasks
nested_items.description: The audits that were performed during the specified time period.

nested_items.name: taskStatus
nested_items.description: The status of this audit. One of 'IN_PROGRESS', 'COMPLETED', 'FAILED', or 'CANCELED'.

nested_items.name: taskType
nested_items.description: The type of this audit. One of 'ON_DEMAND_AUDIT_TASK' or 'SCHEDULED_AUDIT_TASK'.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: A token that can be used to retrieve the next set of results, or null if there are no additional results.
